attributes.action: Refuse to be railroaded into an EU re vote by the 18-24 year old groups.
attributes.background: As it has become apparent that the majority of people demonstrating about the EU Referendum Leave vote appear to be in the 18-24 age bracket, and as the figure of those within this age range actually bothering to vote was a mere 36%, I call on the Government to ban this group from any future votes.
